text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea congestiflora is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.
text.Culture: Known as තිනිය (tiniya) by local people.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea congestiflora". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30818A9580012. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30818A9580012.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
